name: PublicKeyCredential.isUserVerifyingPlatformAuthenticatorAvailable
description: isUserVerifyingPlatformAuthenticatorAvailable() is a static method of the PublicKeyCredential interface that returns a Promise which resolves to true if a user-verifying platform authenticator is available.

refs.name: Web Authentication: An API for accessing Public Key Credentials Level 1
refs.description: The definition of 'isUserVerifyingPlatformAuthenticatorAvailable' in the 'Web Authentication: An API for accessing Public Key Credentials Level 1' specification.
